name: Alien Connection
description:
In this first-person visual novel, you help Kit, a survivor of the earth exploding. Close to starving or going insane from loneliness,  our survivor has spent his entire life on an escape ship on its way to a safe planet. It's your job to help him decide who not only to reach out to for help but also who he'll save. It's no small task deciding whether to open up or travel in isolation, but space demands conviction to survive. 

If you'd like early access to updates and the ability to vote and have a say on what comes in later updates, consider supporting us on Patreon at:

https://www.patreon.com/blackdoorgames

This is a spinoff of another of our currently ongoing games  "Another Assitant"

https://blackdoor.itch.io/another-assistant

We encourage you to check it out but it's not necessary to enjoy this new title. 

New updates are coming so don't forget to follow us so you'll get notifications.
